name: Darn Tough Mountaineering Over-The-Calf Socks - Women's
description: Heavyweight socks with extra cushion for long days in harsh conditions. Temperature regulating merino provides warmth and comfort on extra-cold and extra-long adventures.Made of high-density knit merino wool with nylon and spandex for durability and fit.True seamless construction makes them irresistibly comfortable.Super-thick cushioning underfoot for comfort in hiking or mountaineering boots.Extra-heavy terry-loop construction adds layers of warmth.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
